job_description: Job Overview  As a member of our team you will help streamline the company’s operations and make strategic decisions based on the insight you get from our people and data. You will work with senior stakeholders to execute the company strategy and provide the best service to the business. We know that our people are at the heart of our success and you’ll be critical to ensuring our they’re able to thrive in an open, empowering environment.  Responsibilities and Duties   Handling external or internal communication or management systems  Assist in the preparation of regularly scheduled reports  Research and creates presentations  Organizing, arranging and coordinating meetings  Handle multiple projects  Generate reports  Handle sensitive information in a confidential manner    Qualifications    Attention to detail and problem solving skills  Excellent written and verbal communication skills  Strong organizational and planning skills  Excellent time management skills and ability to multi-task and prioritize work
